select b.BOARD_SEQ, b.CATEGORY_SEQ, b.title , b.contents , b.upload_date , bi.img_name from BOARD b INNER JOIN board_img_rel bir ON b.BOARD_SEQ = bir.BOARD_SEQ INNER JOIN board_img bi ON bir.IMG_SEQ = bi.IMG_SEQ WHERE b.CATEGORY_SEQ = #{CATEGORY_SEQ} ORDER BY b.BOARD_SEQ

select b.BOARD_SEQ, b.title , b.contents , bi.img_name, bi.IMG_SEQ, b.UPLOAD_DATE from BOARD b INNER JOIN board_img_rel bir ON b.BOARD_SEQ = bir.BOARD_SEQ INNER JOIN board_img bi ON bir.IMG_SEQ = bi.IMG_SEQ WHERE b.BOARD_SEQ = #{BOARD_SEQ}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(CATEGORY_SEQ, BOARD_SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, UPLOAD_DATE, VIEWS) VALUES(#{CATEGORY_SEQ},SEQ_BOARD.nextval,'Inhog',#{TITLE},#{CONTENTS},sysdate,'0')
INSERT INTO board_img_rel(BOARD_SEQ, IMG_SEQ) VALUES(SEQ_BOARD.currval, SEQ_IMG.currval)
